p.k: To celebrate Michelle Pfeiffer's birthday on 29 April, Sky Cinema counts down the Oscar-nominated actress' top 10 movies as rated by Alex Zane
Sky Cinema counts down the top 10 most successful films starring Will Smith
When a single mother of two becomes pregnant after a one-night stand, the unlikely pair try to make a go of it. Romantic drama with Christina Ricci
New beginnings emerge for a violent convict when he is placed in a rehabilitation programme involving the training of wild mustangs. With Bruce Dern
Sci-fi animation following the adventures of a little boy who must survive on an explored planet when he gets separated from his parents during a space mission
After a break-up, a lazy but charming young woman finds herself in the care of a famous family friend and decides to make a documentary about her. Comedy-drama
61% When her hometown is devastated by a hurricane, a Florida teenager heads back into danger to find her missing father. But rising waters may be the least of their worries
A down-and-out woman embarks on a rocky journey of self-improvement after realising that her relationships are all ruined and her future is bleak
Lee Pace stars as John DeLorean, whose quest to design the car of the future and friendship with an FBI informant leads to his downfall. Drama with Jason Sudeikis
A troubled young man resurrects his imaginary childhood friend to help him cope with a trauma, without realising that 'Daniel' has deadly intentions. Psychological horror
